high_descs: Turn around and walk towards the bean bag on the floor.
Pick up the basketball from the floor.
Turn around and walk towards the dresser.
Turn on the lamp that is on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a basketball by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk over to the dog bed by the window
Reach down and pick up the basketball from the dog bed
Turn right and walk to the dresser left of the bed
Turn on the lamp on the dresser
anns.task_desc: Examine the basketball by light of the lamp

high_descs: Turn around to your right and stand in front of the bean bag that is on the floor.
Pick up the basketball from the bean bag.
Turn right and walk over to the chest of white drawers.
Turn on the lamp that is on top of the drawers.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp while holding the basketball.
